IceBreaker:TimeStasisPower.NAME: Chronostasis
DESCRIPTIONS: When you obtain #b12 #yChronostasis, enter #yChronogap.

IceBreaker:NextTurnTimeStasisPower.NAME: Chronostasized
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%s #yChronostasis next turn.

IceBreaker:ExtraTurnPower.NAME: Chronogap
DESCRIPTIONS: When you enter #yChronogap , gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE][E] [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL Playing a card in this stance will not trigger enemy buffs.

IceBreaker:ResonancePower.NAME: Resonance
DESCRIPTIONS: When you are in #yChronogap [REMOVE_SPACE], #yResonance adds additional numerical value to #yMagics by #b%d. NL Each use, reduces it by #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE].

IceBreaker:DoubleBlockPower.NAME: Double Block
DESCRIPTIONS: Next #b%d times when you gain #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE], #bdouble it.

IceBreaker:SilverDoorPower.NAME: Silver Gate
DESCRIPTIONS: you won't lose #yResonance.

IceBreaker:LoseResonancePower.NAME: 临Resonance
DESCRIPTIONS: 在你的回合结束, 失去所有 #yResonance.

IceBreaker:FlarierPower.NAME: Flarier
DESCRIPTIONS: Within this turn, whenever you play a #ySpark , gain #b%d #yBlock.

IceBreaker:IcyBurstPower.NAME: 冰爆
DESCRIPTIONS: 在这个回合, 你的 #ySpark 将额外使目标失去 #b%d 点 #yStrength 一回合.

IceBreaker:NegatePower.NAME: Deny
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yRespond unsuccessfully， deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:TimeLeapPower.NAME: Chronoleap
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yChronostasis.

IceBreaker:StarDustPower.NAME: Star Dust
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b%d time you #yConnect Respond successfully each turn, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE].

IceBreaker:NiflheimrPower.NAME: Niflheimr
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, ALL enemies lose #b%d #yStrength [REMOVE_SPACE].
At the start of your turn or whenever you enter #yChronogap , ALL enemies lose #b%d #yStrength [REMOVE_SPACE].

IceBreaker:WheelOfHeatPower.NAME: Flame Wheel
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySpark [REMOVE_SPACE], deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:DemonDeLaplacePower.NAME: Demon De Laplace
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that was created in combat, gain #b%d #yResonance [REMOVE_SPACE].

IceBreaker:ChronoChimePower.NAME: Chronochime
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%d #yMagic card can be affected by #yResonance outside #yChronogap [REMOVE_SPACE].

IceBreaker:DeepCalculatePower.NAME: Deep Calculate
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yConnect card, additionally trigger its #yRespond effects.

IceBreaker:NextTurnPlayCardPower.NAME: Extra Trigger
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, add #b%d copy(ies) of #y%s into your hand.

IceBreaker:NextTurnDamageAllEnemiesPower.NAME: Detonate
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies.

IceBreaker:ChaseTheLightPower.NAME: Catch the Light
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yRespond successfully, draw #b%d card.

IceBreaker:FreeMagicPower.NAME: Free Magic
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%d #yMagic card costs #b0. NL #yGap : Play it twice.

IceBreaker:MagicalFloodPower.NAME: Magical Surge
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter #yChronogap , draw #b%d cards.

IceBreaker:SeeYouTomorrowPower.NAME: Asahi
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yRespond successfully, gain #b%d #yBlock.

IceBreaker:NightOfFireworksPower.NAME: Hanabi
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn or when you enter #yChronogap [REMOVE_SPACE], shuffle #b%d #ySpark into your draw pile.
At the start of your turn or when you enter #yChronogap [REMOVE_SPACE], shuffle #b%d #ySpark+ into your draw pile.

IceBreaker:VitalLoopPower.NAME: Vital Loop
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, you may put up to #b%d card(s) from your discard pile on-top of your draw pile.

IceBreaker:FantasyDreamPower.NAME: Fantasy Dream
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card which does not #yExhaust or is a  #yPower [REMOVE_SPACE], #yExhaust it and #yTrigger it #b%d times more.

IceBreaker:HarshTemperamentPower.NAME: Harsh
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter #yChronogap [REMOVE_SPACE], your next #yMagic card with non #b0 cost will played #b%d times.

IceBreaker:AsterismFormPower.NAME: Asterism Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn or when you enter #yChronogap [REMOVE_SPACE], choose #b1 of #b15 random cards from ALL colors to play, repeat #b%d times.
At the start of your turn or when you enter #yChronogap [REMOVE_SPACE], choose #b1 of #b15 random Upgraded cards from ALL colors to play, repeat #b%d times.

IceBreaker:YesterdayOnceMorePower.NAME: Yesterday Once More
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yRespond successfully, gain #b%d #yChronostasis.
Whenever you play a #yConnect card, gain #b%d #yChronostasis.

IceBreaker:TsukishiRinPower.NAME: Tsukishi Rin
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack to an enemy, it lose #b%d #yStrength.

IceBreaker:ShiroikumoPower.NAME: Shiroi Kumo
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, draw #b%d card.

IceBreaker:FukuhiPower.NAME: Fukuhi
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, clear all your debuffs and heal #b%d HP.

IceBreaker:AmePower.NAME: Ame
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter #yChronogap , agin #b%d #yMetallicize.

IceBreaker:BrandyPower.NAME: Brandy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySpark , gain #b%d [E] .

IceBreaker:DisobeyPower.NAME: Disobey
DESCRIPTIONS: #yConnect can be successful when #yConnect target card is in discard pile.

IceBreaker:TsukishiRitsuPower.NAME: Tsukishi Ritsu
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, enter #yChronogap.
